no-events: Looks like there are no events in the next 3 months. If this seems wrong let us know and we'll give the coach a nudge to make sure he's not napping.
event-begun: This course is currently being run and some previously run sessions are understandably unavailable.

confirmation.text-confirm: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address and your booking is now complete.
confirmation.booking-confirmed: Thanks for your booking! You will receive an email shortly confirming all the details. Have fun out there!
confirmation.pay-later: Please bring payment along with you, or look out for payment instructions from your coach.

booking-admin.address: Here’s your Online Booking website address
booking-admin.code: Want a cool ‘Book Now’ button for your own website? Just copy and paste this into your website on any pages you want a Book Now button!
booking-admin.activate: Activate your PayPal account to accept online payments! - You must have a PayPal business or premier account.
booking-admin.facebook: Let everyone know you’re ready to be booked online! Click to Share your booking site on your Facebook page
booking-admin.facebook-share-name: Book Now on my new Online Booking site!
booking-admin.facebook-share-caption: I’ve just set up my own Online Booking site with Coachseek. All of my lessons & courses are available to book here.
